title: Pak Embassy appreciates community’s participation in Luxembourg Int’l Bazaar
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 16 (APP): Pakistan Embassy in Belgium on Saturday appreciated the active participation of the Pakistani community at the ongoing Luxembourg International Bazaar featuring stalls from across the globe.
“Pakistan’s stall featured a variety of beautiful handicrafts, cuisine, vibrant textiles, and cultural artefacts,” a post on X handle said.
https://x.com/EmbassyPakBel/status/1857802441149837345
